name,
genderID,
birthDate,

profession,

mapper.update:
update passenger
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
genderID = #{genderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthDate = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE},
nationID = #{nationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licenceIssuingAuthorty = #{licenceIssuingAuthorty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papersValidity = #{papersValidity,jdbcType=DATE},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
educationDegreeID = #{educationDegreeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passengerLevelID = #{passengerLevelID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papersID = #{papersID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papersNumber = #{papersNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitsOrAddress = #{unitsOrAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thingReasonID = #{thingReasonID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whereAreFrom = #{whereAreFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whereToGo = #{whereToGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactPhoneNumber = #{contactPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update passenger set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, genderID = #{genderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthDate = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, nationID = #{nationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licenceIssuingAuthorty = #{licenceIssuingAuthorty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papersValidity = #{papersValidity,jdbcType=DATE}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, educationDegreeID = #{educationDegreeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passengerLevelID = #{passengerLevelID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papersID = #{papersID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papersNumber = #{papersNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitsOrAddress = #{unitsOrAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thingReasonID = #{thingReasonID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, whereAreFrom = #{whereAreFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, whereToGo = #{whereToGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactPhoneNumber = #{contactPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from passenger as temp inner join (select attributeDetailsName as genderName,far_id from attributevalue) as tempa on temp.genderID = tempa.far_id ) as tempb inner join (select attributeDetailsName as nationName,far_id as far_id1 from attributevalue) as tempc on tempb.nationID = tempc.far_id1 ) as tempd inner join (select attributeDetailsName as educationDegreeName,far_id as far_id2 from attributevalue) as tempe on tempd.educationDegreeID = tempe.far_id2) as tempf inner join (select attributeDetailsName as passengerLevelName,far_id as far_id3 from attributevalue) as tempg on tempf.passengerLevelID = tempg.far_id3) as temph inner join (select attributeDetailsName as papersName,far_id as far_id4 from attributevalue) as tempi on temph.papersID = tempi.far_id4) as tempj inner join (select attributeDetailsName as thingReasonName,far_id as far_id5 from attributevalue) as tempk on tempj.thingReasonID = tempk.far_id5
tempj.name like #{txtname}

select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from passenger as temp inner join (select attributeDetailsName as genderName,far_id from attributevalue) as tempa on temp.genderID = tempa.far_id ) as tempb inner join (select attributeDetailsName as nationName,far_id as far_id1 from attributevalue) as tempc on tempb.nationID = tempc.far_id1 ) as tempd inner join (select attributeDetailsName as educationDegreeName,far_id as far_id2 from attributevalue) as tempe on tempd.educationDegreeID = tempe.far_id2) as tempf inner join (select attributeDetailsName as passengerLevelName,far_id as far_id3 from attributevalue) as tempg on tempf.passengerLevelID = tempg.far_id3) as temph inner join (select attributeDetailsName as papersName,far_id as far_id4 from attributevalue) as tempi on temph.papersID = tempi.far_id4) as tempj inner join (select attributeDetailsName as thingReasonName,far_id as far_id5 from attributevalue) as tempk on tempj.thingReasonID = tempk.far_id5 where tempj.pid = #{pid}

select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from passenger as temp inner join (select attributeDetailsName as genderName,far_id from attributevalue) as tempa on temp.genderID = tempa.far_id ) as tempb inner join (select attributeDetailsName as nationName,far_id as far_id1 from attributevalue) as tempc on tempb.nationID = tempc.far_id1 ) as tempd inner join (select attributeDetailsName as educationDegreeName,far_id as far_id2 from attributevalue) as tempe on tempd.educationDegreeID = tempe.far_id2) as tempf inner join (select attributeDetailsName as passengerLevelName,far_id as far_id3 from attributevalue) as tempg on tempf.passengerLevelID = tempg.far_id3) as temph inner join (select attributeDetailsName as papersName,far_id as far_id4 from attributevalue) as tempi on temph.papersID = tempi.far_id4) as tempj inner join (select attributeDetailsName as thingReasonName,far_id as far_id5 from attributevalue) as tempk on tempj.thingReasonID = tempk.far_id5

select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from passenger as temp inner join (select attributeDetailsName as genderName,far_id from attributevalue) as tempa on temp.genderID = tempa.far_id ) as tempb inner join (select attributeDetailsName as nationName,far_id as far_id1 from attributevalue) as tempc on tempb.nationID = tempc.far_id1 ) as tempd inner join (select attributeDetailsName as educationDegreeName,far_id as far_id2 from attributevalue) as tempe on tempd.educationDegreeID = tempe.far_id2) as tempf inner join (select attributeDetailsName as passengerLevelName,far_id as far_id3 from attributevalue) as tempg on tempf.passengerLevelID = tempg.far_id3) as temph inner join (select attributeDetailsName as papersName,far_id as far_id4 from attributevalue) as tempi on temph.papersID = tempi.far_id4) as tempj inner join (select attributeDetailsName as thingReasonName,far_id as far_id5 from attributevalue) as tempk on tempj.thingReasonID = tempk.far_id5
tempj.name like #{txtname}
